attributes.action: instruct the appropriate Secretary of State to order a maximum 2-hour "window" for deliveries of orders, etc., to private homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My husband recently ordered a mobile phone and was told it would be delivered some time between 8 a.m. and 6 p.m.: 10 hours!  This is totally unacceptable in my opinion.  People value their time and have commitments; why should they have to spend that sort of time waiting at home (and probably not even daring to go to the loo because ten to one that's when the delivery would be made) just because the company can't give a narrower time-scale?  They should remember that it is the orders of the people they are inconveniencing in this way that are keeping their companies afloat!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
